SELECT DATE_FORMAT(or_sending_deadline, '%Y-%m-%d') AS or_sending_deadline, SUM(or_total_price) AS or_total_price FROM orders WHERE
or_sending_deadline >= DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(NOW() , INTERVAL -7 DAY), '%Y-%m-%d') AND or_sending_deadline <= DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d')
GROUP BY or_sending_deadline ORDER BY or_sending_deadline ASC

SELECT DATE_FORMAT(or_sending_deadline, '%Y-%m-%d') AS or_sending_deadline, SUM(or_total_price+or_payment_commision+or_another_payment_commision) AS or_total_price FROM orders WHERE
or_sending_deadline >= DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(NOW() , INTERVAL -7 DAY), '%Y-%m-%d') AND or_sending_deadline <= DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d')
GROUP BY or_sending_deadline ORDER BY or_sending_deadline ASC

SELECT inne.or_sending_deadline, COUNT(inne.or_serial_special_number) AS total_order_count FROM( SELECT or_serial_special_number, DATE_FORMAT(or_sending_deadline, '%Y-%m-%d') AS or_sending_deadline FROM orders WHERE
or_sending_deadline >= DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(NOW() , INTERVAL -7 DAY), '%Y-%m-%d') AND or_sending_deadline <= DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d')
GROUP BY or_serial_special_number, or_sending_deadline ) inne GROUP BY inne.or_sending_deadline ORDER BY or_sending_deadline ASC

SELECT inne.or_sending_deadline AS or_request, SUM(inne.or_total_price) AS or_total_price FROM ( SELECT DATE_FORMAT(or_sending_deadline, '%Y-%m') AS or_sending_deadline, SUM(or_total_price+or_payment_commision+or_another_payment_commision) AS or_total_price FROM orders WHERE
or_sending_deadline >= DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(NOW() , INTERVAL -5 MONTH), '%Y-%m')
GROUP BY or_sending_deadline ORDER BY or_sending_deadline ASC ) inne GROUP BY inne.or_sending_deadline

SELECT analy.or_sending_deadline, SUM(analy.or_amount * analy.om_option_amount) AS or_amount FROM( SELECT od.or_pk, od.ss_fk, od.or_product, od.or_product_option, od.or_amount, od.or_product_fk, od.or_option_fk, DATE_FORMAT(od.or_sending_deadline, '%Y-%m-%d') as or_sending_deadline, pm.pm_pk, om.om_pk, om.om_store_option_name, om.om_option_amount, op.option_pk, op.option_name FROM orders od INNER JOIN product_matching pm ON od.pm_fk = pm.pm_pk INNER JOIN option_matching om ON om.pm_fk = pm.pm_pk AND od.or_product_option = om.om_store_option_name INNER JOIN options op ON om.option_fk = op.option_pk WHERE
od.or_sending_deadline >= DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL -12 DAY), '%Y-%m-%d') AND od.or_sending_deadline < DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d') AND od.or_cancled_flag = 0
GROUP BY od.or_pk, od.ss_fk, od.or_product, od.or_product_option, od.or_amount, od.or_product_fk, od.or_option_fk, or_sending_deadline, pm.pm_pk, om.om_pk, om.om_store_option_name, om.om_option_amount, op.option_pk, op.option_name ) analy GROUP BY analy.or_sending_deadline ORDER BY analy.or_sending_deadline ASC LIMIT 0, 7

SELECT ${groupList}
,${totalList}
FROM ( SELECT od.or_serial_special_number, IF( od.or_buyer_id IS NULL, '-', od.or_buyer_id) AS or_buyer_id, od.or_product, od.or_product_option, IF( od.or_inflow_route IS NULL, '-', od.or_inflow_route) AS or_inflow_route, IF( od.or_payment_type IS NULL, '-', od.or_payment_type) AS or_payment_type, IF( od.or_payment_position_type IS NULL, '-', od.or_payment_position_type) AS or_payment_position_type, ss.ss_name, od.or_buyer_name, od.or_buyer_contract_number1, od.or_receiver_name, od.or_pk, od.or_total_price, od.or_total_cost, od.or_sending_deadline, od.or_sending_day, od.or_cancled_flag, od.or_refunds, CASE WHEN od.or_cancled_flag = 0 THEN SUM(od.or_amount) END AS or_amount, CASE WHEN od.or_cancled_flag = 1 THEN SUM(od.or_amount) END AS or_cancled_qty FROM orders od INNER JOIN store_section ss ON od.ss_fk = ss.ss_pk
od.or_cancled_flag = 0 AND ss_fk IN
#{storeList}
AND ${dateType} >= DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d') AND ${dateType} < DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL 1 DAY), '%Y-%m-%d')
AND ${dateType} >= DATE_ADD(DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d'),INTERVAL -7 DAY)
AND ${dateType} >= #{dateStart} AND ${dateType} < DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(#{dateEnd}, INTERVAL 1 DAY), '%Y-%m-%d')
AND (or_delivery_invoice_number IS NOT NULL AND or_delivery_invoice_number != '')
AND (or_delivery_invoice_number IS NULL OR or_delivery_invoice_number = '')
AND DATE_FORMAT(od.or_sending_deadline, '%Y-%m-%d') > DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d')
AND DATE_FORMAT(od.or_sending_deadline, '%Y-%m-%d') = DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d')
AND or_buyer_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchKeyword},'%')
AND or_receiver_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchKeyword},'%')
AND or_buyer_contract_number1 LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchKeyword},'%')
AND or_receiver_contract_number1 LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchKeyword},'%')
AND or_order_number LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchKeyword},'%')
AND or_delivery_invoice_number LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchKeyword},'%')
AND (or_shipping_address_detail LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchKeyword},'%') OR or_shipping_address LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchKeyword},'%') )
AND or_delivery_message LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchKeyword},'%')
AND or_product_order_number LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchKeyword},'%')
AND ( or_product LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchKeyword},'%') OR or_product_option LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchKeyword},'%') )
GROUP BY od.or_serial_special_number, od.or_buyer_id, od.or_product, od.or_product_option, od.or_inflow_route, od.or_payment_type, od.or_payment_position_type, ss.ss_name, od.or_buyer_name, od.or_receiver_name, od.or_pk, or_amount, od.or_total_price, od.or_total_cost, od.or_sending_deadline, od.or_sending_day, od.or_cancled_flag, od.or_refunds ORDER BY od.or_settlement_day DESC ) inne GROUP BY ${groupList}

SELECT inne.product_name, inne.option_name, inne.cf_code, SUM(inne.or_amount * inne.om_option_amount) AS qty FROM ( SELECT od.or_serial_special_number, IF( od.or_buyer_id IS NULL, '-', od.or_buyer_id) AS or_buyer_id, od.or_product, od.or_product_option, IF( od.or_inflow_route IS NULL, '-', od.or_inflow_route) AS or_inflow_route, IF( od.or_payment_type IS NULL, '-', od.or_payment_type) AS or_payment_type, IF( od.or_payment_position_type IS NULL, '-', od.or_payment_position_type) AS or_payment_position_type, ss.ss_name, od.or_buyer_name, od.or_buyer_contract_number1, od.or_receiver_name, od.or_pk, od.or_total_price, od.or_total_cost, od.or_sending_deadline, od.or_sending_day, od.or_cancled_flag, od.or_refunds, op.option_name, pro.product_name, om.om_option_amount, cf.cf_code, od.or_amount FROM orders od INNER JOIN store_section ss ON od.ss_fk = ss.ss_pk INNER JOIN product_matching pm ON od.pm_fk = pm.pm_pk INNER JOIN option_matching om ON om.pm_fk = pm.pm_pk AND od.or_product_option = om.om_store_option_name INNER JOIN options op ON om.option_fk = op.option_pk INNER JOIN products pro ON pro.product_pk = op.product_fk INNER JOIN classification cf ON pro.cf_fk = cf.cf_pk WHERE od.or_sending_deadline IN
#{item}
AND od.or_cancled_flag = 0
GROUP BY od.or_serial_special_number, od.or_buyer_id, od.or_product, od.or_product_option, od.or_inflow_route, od.or_payment_type, od.or_payment_position_type, ss.ss_name, od.or_buyer_name, od.or_receiver_name, od.or_pk, or_amount, od.or_total_price, od.or_total_cost, od.or_sending_deadline, od.or_sending_day, om.om_option_amount, op.option_name, pro.product_name, cf.cf_code ORDER BY od.or_settlement_day DESC ) inne GROUP BY inne.product_name, inne.option_name, inne.cf_code ORDER BY inne.cf_code ASC, qty DESC

SELECT or_sending_deadline AS date_end, SUM(inne.or_amount * inne.om_option_amount) AS max_num FROM ( SELECT od.or_serial_special_number, IF( od.or_buyer_id IS NULL, '-', od.or_buyer_id) AS or_buyer_id, od.or_product, od.or_product_option, IF( od.or_inflow_route IS NULL, '-', od.or_inflow_route) AS or_inflow_route, IF( od.or_payment_type IS NULL, '-', od.or_payment_type) AS or_payment_type, IF( od.or_payment_position_type IS NULL, '-', od.or_payment_position_type) AS or_payment_position_type, ss.ss_name, od.or_buyer_name, od.or_buyer_contract_number1, od.or_receiver_name, od.or_pk, od.or_total_price, od.or_total_cost, od.or_sending_deadline, od.or_sending_day, od.or_cancled_flag, od.or_refunds, op.option_name, pro.product_name, om.om_option_amount, CASE WHEN od.or_cancled_flag = 0 THEN SUM(od.or_amount) END AS or_amount, CASE WHEN od.or_cancled_flag = 1 THEN SUM(od.or_amount) END AS or_cancled_qty FROM orders od INNER JOIN store_section ss ON od.ss_fk = ss.ss_pk INNER JOIN product_matching pm ON od.pm_fk = pm.pm_pk INNER JOIN option_matching om ON om.pm_fk = pm.pm_pk AND od.or_product_option = om.om_store_option_name INNER JOIN options op ON om.option_fk = op.option_pk INNER JOIN products pro ON pro.product_pk = op.product_fk WHERE or_sending_deadline > NOW() AND DATE_FORMAT(or_sending_deadline, '%Y-%m') = CONCAT(#{formatYear}, '-',#{formatMonth}) GROUP BY od.or_serial_special_number, od.or_buyer_id, od.or_product, od.or_product_option, od.or_inflow_route, od.or_payment_type, od.or_payment_position_type, ss.ss_name, od.or_buyer_name, od.or_receiver_name, od.or_pk, or_amount, od.or_total_price, od.or_total_cost, od.or_sending_deadline, od.or_sending_day, od.or_cancled_flag, od.or_refunds, om.om_option_amount, op.option_name, pro.product_name ORDER BY od.or_settlement_day DESC ) inne GROUP BY or_sending_deadline

SELECT inne.ss_name, COUNT(inne.or_serial_special_number) AS pm_fk, SUM(inne.or_delivery_price) AS or_delivery_price, SUM(inne.or_delivery_discount_price) AS or_delivery_discount_price, ( SUM(inne.total_price) - ( SUM(inne.total_price) * inne.ss_commission / 100 ) ) AS or_total_price FROM ( SELECT ss.ss_name, ss.ss_commission, od.or_serial_special_number,
SUM( if(or_refunds > 0,
-((or_total_price+ or_payment_commision+ or_another_payment_commision) / or_amount) * or_refunds,
or_total_price+ or_payment_commision+ or_another_payment_commision ) )as total_price,
od.or_delivery_price, od.or_delivery_discount_price
FROM orders od INNER JOIN store_section ss ON od.ss_fk = ss.ss_pk WHERE
or_sending_deadline >= #{dateStart} AND or_sending_deadline < DATE_ADD(#{dateEnd}, INTERVAL 1 DAY)
AND or_cancled_flag = 0 GROUP BY ss.ss_name, ss.ss_commission, od.or_serial_special_number, od.or_delivery_price, od.or_delivery_discount_price ) inne GROUP BY inne.ss_name, inne.ss_commission

SELECT inne.ss_name, COUNT(inne.or_serial_special_number) AS pm_fk, SUM(inne.or_delivery_price) AS or_delivery_price, SUM(inne.or_delivery_discount_price) AS or_delivery_discount_price, SUM(inne.total_price) AS or_total_price FROM ( SELECT ss.ss_name, ss.ss_commission, od.or_serial_special_number, SUM( or_total_price+ or_payment_commision+ or_another_payment_commision )as total_price, od.or_delivery_price, od.or_delivery_discount_price
FROM orders od INNER JOIN store_section ss ON od.ss_fk = ss.ss_pk WHERE
or_sending_deadline >= #{dateStart} AND or_sending_deadline < DATE_ADD(#{dateEnd}, INTERVAL 1 DAY)
AND or_cancled_flag = 1 GROUP BY ss.ss_name, ss.ss_commission, od.or_serial_special_number, od.or_delivery_price, od.or_delivery_discount_price ) inne GROUP BY inne.ss_name

SELECT COUNT(INNE.or_serial_special_number) AS total_order_count, ROUND(AVG(INNE.or_amount)) AS or_amount, ROUND(AVG(INNE.or_total_price)) AS or_total_price, INNE.CUT_ADDRESS AS or_shipping_address FROM(
SELECT od.or_serial_special_number, SUM(od.or_amount) AS or_amount, SUM(od.or_total_price) AS or_total_price, CASE WHEN SUBSTRING(od.or_shipping_address, 1, INSTR(od.or_shipping_address, ' ')) = '강원' THEN '강원도' WHEN SUBSTRING(od.or_shipping_address, 1, INSTR(od.or_shipping_address, ' ')) = '경기' THEN '경기도' WHEN SUBSTRING(od.or_shipping_address, 1, INSTR(od.or_shipping_address, ' ')) = '경남' THEN '경상남도' WHEN SUBSTRING(od.or_shipping_address, 1, INSTR(od.or_shipping_address, ' ')) = '경북' THEN '경상북도' WHEN SUBSTRING(od.or_shipping_address, 1, INSTR(od.or_shipping_address, ' ')) = '광주' THEN '광주광역시' WHEN SUBSTRING(od.or_shipping_address, 1, INSTR(od.or_shipping_address, ' ')) = '대구' THEN '대구광역시' WHEN SUBSTRING(od.or_shipping_address, 1, INSTR(od.or_shipping_address, ' ')) = '대전' THEN '대전광역시' WHEN SUBSTRING(od.or_shipping_address, 1, INSTR(od.or_shipping_address, ' ')) = '부산' THEN '부산광역시' WHEN SUBSTRING(od.or_shipping_address, 1, INSTR(od.or_shipping_address, ' ')) = '서울' OR SUBSTRING(od.or_shipping_address, 1, INSTR(od.or_shipping_address, ' ')) = '서울시' THEN '서울특별시' WHEN SUBSTRING(od.or_shipping_address, 1, INSTR(od.or_shipping_address, ' ')) = '울산' THEN '울산광역시' WHEN SUBSTRING(od.or_shipping_address, 1, INSTR(od.or_shipping_address, ' ')) = '인천' THEN '인천광역시' WHEN SUBSTRING(od.or_shipping_address, 1, INSTR(od.or_shipping_address, ' ')) = '전남' THEN '전라남도' WHEN SUBSTRING(od.or_shipping_address, 1, INSTR(od.or_shipping_address, ' ')) = '전북' THEN '전라북도' WHEN SUBSTRING(od.or_shipping_address, 1, INSTR(od.or_shipping_address, ' ')) = '충남' THEN '충청남도' WHEN SUBSTRING(od.or_shipping_address, 1, INSTR(od.or_shipping_address, ' ')) = '충북' THEN '충청북도' ELSE SUBSTRING(od.or_shipping_address, 1, INSTR(od.or_shipping_address, ' ')) END AS CUT_ADDRESS FROM orders od WHERE
od.or_regdate >= #{dateStart} AND od.or_regdate < DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(#{dateEnd}, INTERVAL 1 DAY), '%Y-%m-%d')
AND od.or_cancled_flag = 0 GROUP BY od.or_serial_special_number, CUT_ADDRESS ) INNE GROUP BY INNE.CUT_ADDRESS ORDER BY CUT_ADDRESS

SUBSTRING(od.or_shipping_address, 1, INSTR(od.or_shipping_address, ' ')) = '강원' THEN '강원도' WHEN SUBSTRING(od.or_shipping_address, 1, INSTR(od.or_shipping_address, ' ')) = '경기' THEN '경기도' WHEN SUBSTRING(od.or_shipping_address, 1, INSTR(od.or_shipping_address, ' ')) = '경남' THEN '경상남도' WHEN SUBSTRING(od.or_shipping_address, 1, INSTR(od.or_shipping_address, ' ')) = '경북' THEN '경상북도' WHEN SUBSTRING(od.or_shipping_address, 1, INSTR(od.or_shipping_address, ' ')) = '광주' THEN '광주광역시' WHEN SUBSTRING(od.or_shipping_address, 1, INSTR(od.or_shipping_address, ' ')) = '대구' THEN '대구광역시' WHEN SUBSTRING(od.or_shipping_address, 1, INSTR(od.or_shipping_address, ' ')) = '대전' THEN '대전광역시' WHEN SUBSTRING(od.or_shipping_address, 1, INSTR(od.or_shipping_address, ' ')) = '부산' THEN '부산광역시' WHEN SUBSTRING(od.or_shipping_address, 1, INSTR(od.or_shipping_address, ' ')) = '서울' OR SUBSTRING(od.or_shipping_address, 1, INSTR(od.or_shipping_address, ' ')) = '서울시' THEN '서울특별시' WHEN SUBSTRING(od.or_shipping_address, 1, INSTR(od.or_shipping_address, ' ')) = '울산' THEN '울산광역시' WHEN SUBSTRING(od.or_shipping_address, 1, INSTR(od.or_shipping_address, ' ')) = '인천' THEN '인천광역시' WHEN SUBSTRING(od.or_shipping_address, 1, INSTR(od.or_shipping_address, ' ')) = '전남' THEN '전라남도' WHEN SUBSTRING(od.or_shipping_address, 1, INSTR(od.or_shipping_address, ' ')) = '전북' THEN '전라북도' WHEN SUBSTRING(od.or_shipping_address, 1, INSTR(od.or_shipping_address, ' ')) = '충남' THEN '충청남도' WHEN SUBSTRING(od.or_shipping_address, 1, INSTR(od.or_shipping_address, ' ')) = '충북' THEN '충청북도' ELSE SUBSTRING(od.or_shipping_address, 1, INSTR(od.or_shipping_address, ' ')) END AS CUT_ADDRESS FROM orders od INNER JOIN product_matching pm ON od.pm_fk = pm.pm_pk INNER JOIN option_matching om ON om.pm_fk = pm.pm_pk AND od.or_product_option = om.om_store_option_name INNER JOIN options op ON om.option_fk = op.option_pk INNER JOIN products pro ON pro.product_pk = op.product_fk INNER JOIN classification cf ON cf_pk = pro.cf_fk WHERE
od.or_regdate >= #{dateStart} AND od.or_regdate < DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(#{dateEnd}, INTERVAL 1 DAY), '%Y-%m-%d')
AND od.or_cancled_flag = 0 AND cf.cf_pk NOT IN (4, 8,11, 19, 20, 21,22, 26) ) INNE WHERE INNE.CUT_ADDRESS = #{searchKeyword} GROUP BY products, INNE.cf_code_type, INNE.cf_pk ORDER BY total_amount DESC

SELECT COUNT(INNE.or_serial_special_number) AS total_order, INNE.or_inflow_route FROM( SELECT od.or_serial_special_number, od.or_inflow_route, CASE WHEN SUBSTRING(od.or_shipping_address, 1, INSTR(od.or_shipping_address, ' ')) = '강원' THEN '강원도' WHEN SUBSTRING(od.or_shipping_address, 1, INSTR(od.or_shipping_address, ' ')) = '경기' THEN '경기도' WHEN SUBSTRING(od.or_shipping_address, 1, INSTR(od.or_shipping_address, ' ')) = '경남' THEN '경상남도' WHEN SUBSTRING(od.or_shipping_address, 1, INSTR(od.or_shipping_address, ' ')) = '경북' THEN '경상북도' WHEN SUBSTRING(od.or_shipping_address, 1, INSTR(od.or_shipping_address, ' ')) = '광주' THEN '광주광역시' WHEN SUBSTRING(od.or_shipping_address, 1, INSTR(od.or_shipping_address, ' ')) = '대구' THEN '대구광역시' WHEN SUBSTRING(od.or_shipping_address, 1, INSTR(od.or_shipping_address, ' ')) = '대전' THEN '대전광역시' WHEN SUBSTRING(od.or_shipping_address, 1, INSTR(od.or_shipping_address, ' ')) = '부산' THEN '부산광역시' WHEN SUBSTRING(od.or_shipping_address, 1, INSTR(od.or_shipping_address, ' ')) = '서울' OR SUBSTRING(od.or_shipping_address, 1, INSTR(od.or_shipping_address, ' ')) = '서울시' THEN '서울특별시' WHEN SUBSTRING(od.or_shipping_address, 1, INSTR(od.or_shipping_address, ' ')) = '울산' THEN '울산광역시' WHEN SUBSTRING(od.or_shipping_address, 1, INSTR(od.or_shipping_address, ' ')) = '인천' THEN '인천광역시' WHEN SUBSTRING(od.or_shipping_address, 1, INSTR(od.or_shipping_address, ' ')) = '전남' THEN '전라남도' WHEN SUBSTRING(od.or_shipping_address, 1, INSTR(od.or_shipping_address, ' ')) = '전북' THEN '전라북도' WHEN SUBSTRING(od.or_shipping_address, 1, INSTR(od.or_shipping_address, ' ')) = '충남' THEN '충청남도' WHEN SUBSTRING(od.or_shipping_address, 1, INSTR(od.or_shipping_address, ' ')) = '충북' THEN '충청북도' ELSE SUBSTRING(od.or_shipping_address, 1, INSTR(od.or_shipping_address, ' ')) END AS CUT_ADDRESS FROM orders od WHERE
od.or_regdate >= #{dateStart} AND od.or_regdate < DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(#{dateEnd}, INTERVAL 1 DAY), '%Y-%m-%d')
